Forging Antiquity

The website for the Australian Research Council Discovery Project: Forging Antiquity: Authenticity, forgery and fake papyri

Lauren Dundler

HDR student at Macquarie University concerned with the illicit antiquities trade, art crime and cultural heritage law; the ethics of cultural heritage, provenance and academic practice; cultural heritage policy development and implementation; provenance research.

Currently contributing to the Markers of Authenticity Seminar series. See my academia.edu page, and contact me at lauren@forgingantiquity.com.
